student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to the museum. Let’s explore together. The entrance is right here. Where would you like to go first?
Great choice! The paintings section is on the second floor. Take the stairs or the elevator to your left. When you reach the top, turn right, and you’ll see it straight ahead. Ready to go?
Perfect! Let’s head to the second floor. Follow me, and I’ll show you the way. The stairs are just past the information desk. Let’s go!

Great! We’re almost there. Just a few more steps, and you’ll see the paintings section right in front of you. Enjoy exploring the beautiful artwork! Let me know if you need help finding anything else.
Thank you! I will look around.
You’re welcome! Good job explaining where things are in the museum. You’ve completed the task. Enjoy your time exploring, and talk to you later!
